evidence.claim: The company provides detailed information on HIPAA compliance relevant to EHR integrations.
They mention the use of health-tech standards like HL7 for interoperability between healthcare systems.
No specific APIs or cloud services were found on the website related to their technical setup.
They discuss compliance with health data regulations but lack information on specific data platforms or transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or API capabilities found.
